text: ghar se vida hokar veena arun ke sang madhuban hotal mein aa gaee
aage ka kaaryakram vaheen se tay hona tha
madhuban hotal mein prem ne pahale se hee do kamare buk karava rakhe the
ek mein veena va arun ruk gae aur doosare mein arun ka mitr suneel va maan kalaavatee thahar gae
yah saadageepoorn parinay bandhan veena ke pichhale dinon se bilkul vipareet tha
koee bahoo ke svaagat ke lie nahin tha
na hee grhapravesh kee rasm thee na koee mangalageet na aaratee utaaree kisee ne
saas saath hee thee par usakee upasthiti na ke baraabar thee
jo arun ko samajh aa raha tha vahee vah karava raha tha apane mitr se kahakar
haan usaka photo seshan bahut lamba chala
veena ke sang usane lagabhag do reel tasveeren khinchavaeen
shaadee ke in palon ko vah sanjokar rakhana chaahata tha
reetirivaaz kee use jaanakaaree na thee aur na hee kalaavatee koee reetirivaaz nibhaana chaah rahee thee
veena apane mein hee khoee huee thee aur apanee upasthiti muskura bhar kar pooree kar rahee thee
raat ka khaana khaane ke samay prem va suneeta bhee aa gae the
sabane ekasaath khaana khaaya aur vaheen tay hua ki ve log kal subah dillee vaapis laut jaenge
khaana samaapt kar prem va suneeta ne unase vida lee aur arun unhen neeche chhodane aaya
risepshan kauntar ke paas ruk kar usane prem se ekaek poochh liya  prem yahaan ka bil kya tumane ada kar diya hai ya ki subah tum aaoge
prem ko kuchh atapataasa laga ekaek arun ka poochhana aur aise mein vah bas itana hee kah paaya  isakee aap chinta na keejie
main sab svayan kar loonga
aisee baat nahin hai prem mainne bas apanee jaanakaaree ke lie poochha hai
main subah svayan poochhakar kreditakaard se pement kar doonga arun ne apanee baat saphaee se kah dee
pahale to usane poochhaaphir svayan hee apane prashn ka khulaasa kiya
lekin prem shishtaachaar mein phir se bola  yah sab aap mujh par chhodie main subah nau baje aapako yaheen miloonga
isase aage baat yaheen samaapt karate hue prem ne kaha  ab aap aaraam keejie
subah se thake hue hain
aur arun se haath mila kar usane vida lee
suneeta is beech kuchh nahin bolee
bas arun ko nihaaratee rahee
shaadee do aatmaon ka milan hai
sanyog jab banata hai to saatasamandar paar se bhee rishta jud jaata hai
ek saptaah pahale koee arun ko jaanata bhee na tha aur ek saptaah baad vah ghar ka sadasy ban gaya hai
yah rishta banaane kanaada se chalakar arun ka aana jaise nishchit tha
suneeta kuchh aisee hee baaten sochatee hai
ghar mein sabhee use majaak mein daadee maan bhee kahate hain
kamare mein laut kar arun ne dekha veena parda hata kar baahar jagamagaatee masooree kee sundarata ko dekh rahee thee
deharaadoon se masooree aur masooree se deharaadoon kee chhata raat ko dekhane se aisa lagata ki ek aakaashaganga oopar hai aur doosaree yahaan dharatee par
lekin arun ko is samay na oopar kee aakaashaganga dikh rahee thee aur na door masooree kee jagamagaatee roshanee se aanand aa raha tha
vah to veena ko apane nikat dekhakar aseem aanand kee anubhooti pa raha tha
vah chup baithee veena ko ek tak nihaarane laga
kitanee sundar thee vah badeebadee see aankhen lambeepatalee naak sundar honth kul milaakar ek aakarshak chehara
dekhane vaala ekatak dekhata rah jaata
veena ne ek najar arun kee or dekha
use svayan ko dekhate paakar vah laja gaee aur apanee aankhen neechee kar leen
usane halke se muskuraane kee cheshta kee
arun ne ise aamantran samajh kar usaka chehara uthaaya
usakee aankhon mein jhaankate hue usane kaha main jab kanaada se aaya tha to sapane mein bhee ummeed na thee ki tum jaisee sundar ladakee mujhe apanee patnee ke roop mein milegee
aaj mujhe apanee kismat par naaz hai
tumhen apane saath paakar bhool gaya hoon ki main pandrah varshon se bilkul akela hoon
arun ne apanee hatheliyon mein le liya tha veena ke chehare ko
veena bhee ekatak dekh rahee thee ab usako
lekin vah bolee nahin kuchh bhee
arun ne use dekhate hue phir kahana shuroo kar diya tumhen mere saath kuchh din ajeebasa lagega
lekin meree koshish rahegee ki tumhen main khush rakh sakoon
aur khush rakh sakoonga tabhee jab tum apane beete dinon ko bhool jaogee aur mere saath aane vaale har pal ka sukh bhog sakogee
usakee baat sunakar veena kee palaken bheeg aaee theen
vah kuchh bolane ko huee
usake honth lekin phadaphada kar rah gae
arun ko laga ki use aisee baat nahin karanee chaahie thee
tab usane kaha oh aay am riyalee vairee saaairee
mujhe aisee baat nahin karanee chaahie thee
aur veena vishvaas rakho aage se aisa kuchh na kahoonga
yah kahakar arun ne usake gaalon ko thapathapaaya aur haath hataate hue bola chalo utho ab chenj kar lo
veena uthane ko huee
tab arun ne phir kaha main pichhale pandrah varshon se akela hoon kanaada mein
mere akelepan ka saathee nahin mila mujhe
tum milee ho itane varshon baad to ab lagata hai jeevan mein akelepan kee ghadiyaan ab nahin aaengee
aur meree koshish bhee rahegee ki tum bhee koee kamee mahasoos nahin kar sako
veena muskura kar baatharoom mein chalee gaee aur arun baith gaya usee kursee par jahaan veena baithee baahar dekh rahee thee
ekaek jeevan badalaasa mahasoos hua use
ekaakeepan mein kabhee socha bhee na tha usane bas dinaraat kaam mein dooba rahata tha
paisa kamaane aur paisa jodane kee dhun mein mast rahata tha
ghar basaane kee baat tabhee usake man mein uthatee thee jab vah dochaar maheene mein ek baar maan se phon par baat karata tha
vahee kahatee thee umr beetatee ja rahee hai ab ghar basaane kee soch lo
yahaan aakar ladakee dhoondh lo ya phir vaheen kisee goreemem se shaadee kar lo
arun haan sochoonga kahakar baat samaapt kar deta
baarabaar sochata tha bhaarat jaoonga vaheen se apanee dulhan laoonga
yahaan goreememon ke chakkar mein nahin padoonga
dostee tak sab theek hai
ghar basaane ke lie sanskaaron vaalee ladakee chaahie
sanskaar kya apanee soch jaisee ladakee chaahie
manushy kee jaisee soch hotee hai vaise hee usake sanskaar ban jaate hain
kanaada mein rahate hue bhee usake sanskaar poornatah bhaarateey hee the
poorn roop se shaakaahaaree
mandira se door rahane vaala
sabhee use pandit jee kahate the
aise mein use vahaan kanaada mein goreemem se pataree baithatee nahin dikhatee thee
bhaarateey mool ke logon mein bhee use apanee soch ke anuroop koee janchatee nahin thee
haan ekado pasand aaeen use lekin unhen vah pasand nahin aaya
kasaratee shareer lambaachauda deeladaul aur us par rang bhee usaka gahara saanvala tha
aavaaz bhee kadakadaar
kaam ke lie to sambandh sabhee rakhate the
maujamastee ke lie sabhee mil jaate the
lekin ghar basaane kee baat par koee nahin mil paaya
sanyog se milee thee veena
tabhee itane varsh prateeksha karanee padee
ekaek use laga jaise usakee janmabhoomi use bula rahee hai
pandrah saal ka pravaas jaise poora hua usaka
ek maheene ka prograam bana liya
aane se pahale apane kaaailej ke mitr se baat kar lee
ek vahee tha suneel jisase usaka patravyavahaar ho jaata tha
usee ne arun ke aane se pahale akhabaar mein vigyaapan de diya tha
achchhee ladakee ka
umr aade aa rahee thee
usee ko golamol kar gae
achchhee ladakee chaahie chaahe vidhava ho chaahe talaakashuda bas baahar chalakar rahane ko raajee ho
enaaraee kee chhaap bada mahatv rakhatee hai
aur arun to ab bhaarateey mool ka kanaada ka naagarik tha
ek samasya aur bhee thee
desh lautakar maan ke paas rahane kee samasya
vah to ek kamara kiraaye par lekar akelee rahatee thee
pati se kaanoon kee ladaee lad rahee thee pichhale bees varshon se
apane svaabhimaan ko banae rakhane ke lie bhaeeyon se bhee madad nahin maangatee thee
donon khaanadaan dillee ke naameegiraamee raeeson ke the
lekin maan thee ki gumanaamee kee jindagee jeetee thee
aise mein arun ne hee maan ko samajhaaya ki usakee shaadee kee khaatir vah kuchh din tak usake maama ke ghar par hee rah le
maan kaise rahatee hai kaise peechhe ke din bitae isakee soch usake mastishk mein nahin aatee thee
bas kartavy maatr itana samajhaaya tha ki saalachhah maheene mein hajaaradohajaar dolar vah maan ko jaroor bhej deta tha
ab shaadee karane kee ichchha balavatee ho rahee thee to yah sab baaten usake lie maayane rakhatee theen
maan ko to pichhale pandrah saalon mein shaayad pandrahabees hajaar dolar bheje the usane
parantu maamaamaamee ke lie jaroor beshakeematee upahaar laana nahin bhoola
hamaaree sabase badee kamajoree hai
kitane bhee raees kyon na hon ham jab koee bahumooly upahaar laata hai to man baagabaag ho uthata hai
arun jab pahuncha to chitthiyon ka dher laga tha
veena kee chitthee use janchee aur usane turant usaka javaab bhej diya
milane kee ichchha jataee aur aise mein chat manganee pat shaadee ho gaee
arun parinay bandhan mein bandh gaya
veena kee beetee jindagee kee daastaan sunakar use laga yahee vah ladakee hai jo usakee soch ka sambal ban sakatee hai
yahee vah ladakee hai jo usake desh mein usake parivesh mein dhal jaegee
parinayasootr mein bandhane ka samay aa gaya tha usakee jindagee mein aur aise mein chand dinon mein usakee jindagee ke ek nae adhyaay kee shurooaat ho gaee
man baagabaag ho utha veena ko apane jeevan mein paakar
arun kee tandra bhang huee
veena ko paakar vah bhaavavibhor ho utha
jeevan mein usake naee bahaaren aa gaeen
aisa ehasaas use pahale kabhee nahin hua tha veena ko apanee baahon mein lekar vah mastamadahosh ho gaya
raat ke do baj rahe the jab veena kee aankh khuleen
usake pahaloo mein arun soya hua tha
ek najar arun par daalee usane
phir khud ko dekhane kee cheshta kee usane sharma gaee apane ko dekhakar
kamare mein halkee see roshanee thee
arun kee baajoo dheere se hataakar vah karavat badal kar let gaee
ab usakee aankhon ke saamane khidakee thee aur khidakee ke baahar use taaron bhara aakaash dikh raha tha
veena kee najar aur nahin jhatakee unheen taaron mein se ek taare par thithak kar rah gaee
bahut chamak raha tha
vah taara
use vah taara apanee aankhon ke nikat aata dikhaee diya
bahut dinon baad use laga yah raat achchhee hai yah taare usake saathee hain
aur sabase alag use yah sochakar bhee achchha laga ki in taaron ko dekhakar ab vah muskara sakatee hai
vah muskaraee bhee aur phir se ek najar arun par daalee
vah ekatak use dekhane lagee
arun so raha tha
saanson kee aavaaz aa rahee thee
shareer se bhaaree tha arun
saanvala tha
binaachashme ke is samay chehara veena ko anjaan sa laga
aakarshanaheen
ekaek na keval veena kee muskuraahat lupt ho gaee balki vah udaas ho gaee
bhool gaee ki abhee kuchh der pahale isee vyakti ne use shaareerikasukh diya hai
arun use ajanabee sa lagane laga
veena ne arun se apanee drshti hata lee
phir baahar kee or dekhane lagee aur use vahee taara phir dikh gaya
vah use aur adhik timatimaata laga
jaise us taare ne aakaash ke dochaar taaron ka tej churaakar apane aapako aur adhik aakarshak bana liya ho
vah taara dheeredheere use aakaar mein badalata dikhaee diya
o ye kya
veena ekaek uthakar baith gaee
kuchh daree bhee
kuchh saham see gaee
vah dev tha
haan dev
saamane khidakee mein
dekh raha tha veena kee or
veena aavaaz goonjee dev kee
veena kaanpane lagee
usakee aankhen svayan bahane lageen
tumane shaadee kar lee veena mubaarak ho
bahutabahut mubaarak
dev muskura raha tha usake saamane
kitana sundar kitana aalaukik roop lag raha tha usaka
is samay usane vahee kapade pahan rakhe the
sabase sundar lagate the jo use saphed ujjaval saphaaree soot
jise har achchhe avasar par pahanane kee veena hee jidd karatee thee
dev ke munh se mubaarak sunakar veena muskuraee nahin
aur adhik aansoo bahane lage usakee aankhon se
honth budabudaaye bhee
dev ka hee naam
dev dev vahee man hee man usaka naam lene lagee
mere naam se judaakar liya apana naam veena
ab koee nahin kahega dev kee veena
ab koee nahin kahega veena ka dev
ye tumane kya kiya veena main tumhen apane se alag kaise kar paoonga bhool gaeen kya tum to svayan kahatee theen hamaara janmajanm ka saath hai
pichhale janm mein ham mile the
is janm mein mile hain aur thode se intajaar ke baad main tumase aakar mil jaoongee taaki agale janm mein phir se mil saken
ab aisa kuchh nahin hoga
ab aisa kuchh nahin hoga
veena ko laga dev maayoos ho utha hai
naheennaheen dev tum maayoos na ho
yah maayoosee tumhen achchhee nahin lagatee
tum muskurao
main tumhen kahaan bhoolee hoon main tumhen nahin bhool sakatee
yah jag dikhaava hai dev yah duniya kee reeti hai
mainne duniya se apana peechha chhudavaaya hai mainne tumase apana pind nahin chhudavaaya
main to tumhaaree hoon tumhen kaise bhool paoongee main tumhen nahin bhool sakoongee kabheebhee
aur veena halke se sisakane lagee thee
lekin arun ne usakee sisakiyaan nahin sunee
vah to nidra mein leen tha
usakee varshon kee pyaas mitee thee aur vah usee se madahosh ho gaya tha
veena kahaan thee is samay isase bekhabar
kuchh der baad veena ne phir aankhen utha kar dekha dev vaheen khada tha
khidakee ke baahar
veena ko hee dekh raha tha
ekaek veena uthee
khidakee kee taraph gaee
khidakee ke baahar jhaank kar dekha
vahaan to kuchh bhee nahin tha
usane khidakee band kar dee
vaheen rakhee kursee par baithakar vah arun ko dekhane lagee
use yaad aaya ho jaise ki dev to ab kaheen nahin
aaj usakee is saamane so rahe vyakti se shaadee huee hai
vah ab usakee patnee hai
dev se ab usaka koee naata nahin
dev ab usake lie pichhale janm kee kahaanee ban gaya hai
is nae janm se usaka koee sambandh nahin
lekin kya yah sach hai ki vah is nae janm mein dev ko apane man se nikaal paegee
use apane se kie is prashn ka koee uttar sunaee nahin diya
kitanee chuppee se kitanee saadagee se aaj usakee shaadee ho gaee arun se
use jaise vishvaas nahin aaya
shaadee to kitanee dhoom se hotee hai
kitanee khushiyaan manaee jaatee hain
har din mangal geet gae jaate hain
kitane sapane sanjotee hai ladakee haan sapane hee to hote hain ve sab
veena ke lie sabhee kuchh svapn raha hai
abhee tak
usane bhee kabhee kitanee khushiyaan manaee theen
usake lie bhee mangal geet gaaye gae the
ghar bhar mein haphte bhar tak dholak kee thaap goonjee thee
shaadee ke din se mehamaanon ka aanaajaana laga hua tha
aur veena svayan vah svayan to madahosh thee
shaadee ke din hee nahin balki us din se jab pahalee baar usane dev ko dekha tha
haan dev kitana sundar tha
veena ko saamane dev dikha ab arun kee jagah aur usakee aankhen vaheen kursee par baithe mund gaeen
kho gaee vah beete dinon mein
dev ke sahavaas mein
dev kee yaadon mein
dev ke saath beete palapal mein
jisamen dher see khushiyaan bhee theen dher se gam bhee
hansee bhee thee aansoo bhee the
lekin in sabase oopar use apane jeevan kee kitanee keemat chukaanee padee usaka koee hisaab bhee veena ke paas na tha
